Common.block_hint_service_describe: Create an encrypted note. Notes are encrypted in the browser, not on the server. Secret keys and unencrypted data are not accessible to the server. You will receive a secret link to decrypt. Notes are deleted from the server immediately after viewing or upon expiration.
Common.block_hint_save_note_result_text: This is the secret link to read the note. You can copy it.
Common.block_hint_decrypt: You have opened the secret note. It cannot be opened again as it has been deleted from the server. Copy the necessary data.
Common.block_hint_try_open: Do you really want to open the note? The note can only be opened once.
Common.block_hint_try_decrypt: You are trying to open the secret note. Any attempt to open it will result in its destruction.
Common.block_hint_error_decrypt: Unable to open the secret note. It may have already been opened by someone else or the expiration period has passed.
Common.form_input_tooltip_secret_key: This is the secret key used to encrypt your secret note.
